description:
Shimano® brings their classic SPD® reliability and performance to this pedal, perfected for mountain or road riding.

  • Compact body design
  • Open binding allows easy entry and mud shedding
  • Adjustable entry and tension release settings
  • Chromoly spindle
  • Sealed bearing cartridge axle
  • SM-SH51 single-release cleats included
name: Shimano PD-M520 SPD Pedals
